headline: Inside the Nightmare at 345 Park Avenue, a Manhattan Office Tower Under Attack
summary: Employees at firms including Blackstone and KPMG hid and set up barricades during the gunman’s rampage.

headline: Alberta's $334 Billion Power Play Could Blow Up Canada's Pension System
summary: Danielle Smith is taking on Ottawa, slashing Aimco, and eyeing a CPP exit that could reshape the nation's finances.

headline: Top Blackstone Real Estate Executive Among Those Killed in Manhattan Shooting
summary: A gunman opened fire in a busy New York office building on Monday, killing three people before turning the gun on himself.

headline: One of Blackstone’s Highest-Ranking Women Killed in Shooting
summary: Wesley LePatner was a star in Blackstone’s vast real-estate business, rising to oversee one of its major strategies and one of its biggest funds.

headline: Trump Says Was Briefed on ‘Tragic Shooting’ in Midtown Manhattan
summary: (Bloomberg) -- President Donald Trump said he had been briefed on the mass shooting in a Manhattan office tower that left at least four people dead, an incident that shut down a large stretch of Midtown and sent employees in the area into lockdown.Most Read from BloombergBudapest’s Most Historic Site Gets a Controversial RebuildSan Francisco in Talks With Vanderbilt for Downtown CampusThe World’s Data Center Capital Has Residents SurroundedAn Abandoned Art-Deco Landmark in Buffalo Awaits Revival

headline: Four Dead in Shooting at New York City Building Housing Blackstone, NFL
summary: Four people, including a police officer, are dead after a lone gunman opened fire inside the Manhattan building that houses private-equity firm Blackstone’s midtown office and other high-profile businesses.

raw.headline: Four Dead in Shooting at New York City Building Housing Blackstone, NFL
raw.summary: Four people, including a police officer, are dead after a lone gunman opened fire inside the Manhattan building that houses private-equity firm Blackstone’s midtown office and other high-profile businesses.

headline: Gunman Kills Four and Himself at Midtown Manhattan Building
summary: (Bloomberg) -- A gunman killed at least four people and himself at an office tower that houses Blackstone Inc., Rudin Management, the National Football League and KPMG among others, sparking hours of chaos and fear in Midtown Manhattan on Monday evening.Most Read from BloombergBudapest’s Most Historic Site Gets a Controversial RebuildSan Francisco in Talks With Vanderbilt for Downtown CampusCan This Bridge Ease the Troubled US-Canadian Relationship?Trump Administration Sues NYC Over Sanctuary Ci
